review_data.title: Cool place
review_data.content: We had a very nice dinner at Mambo Cafe. Excellent Salad and very good "Tartar". The toast could be of better quality and warmer. The "panna cotta" was excellent, just a bit small. The Blues-Concert was splendid. Thanks for a gread evening - we'll come...More
